Series.Actors: | Adrienne Posta|Anna Bentinck|Bob Saker|Ciara Janson|Dan Russell|Keith Wickham|Lewis McCloud|
Series.Overview: 64 Zoo Lane is a charming animation series created by the award-winning director and creator An Vrombaut to captivate and inform young children. The series combines intelligent storytelling with a timeless, picture book quality, and features a whole range of diverse characters native to many parts of the world. Lucy lives at 64 Zoo Lane, right next door to the local zoo. Every night from her bedroom window, Lucy slides down Georgina the Giraffe's long neck to the Zoo below to meet the animals. Each animal, including Boris the Bear, Giggles and Tickles the two monkeys, Harriet the Hippo and Nelson the Elephant, have different tales to tell and each night they impatiently await their turn to tell her about their adventures. Opportunities for exploring language and vocabulary are enhanced by the use of intonation.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Nelson the Elephant
Episode.Overview: Georgina the giraffe tells Lucy about Nelson, a noisy young elephant.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Kevin the Crocodile
Episode.Overview: Victor tells the tale of Kevin, a crocodile who tries to become mean and nasty.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Joey the Kangaroo
Episode.Overview: Rebbit the frog tells the tale of Joey, a young kangaroo who cannot skip.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Snowbert the Polar Bear
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Snowbert, a lonely polar bear who makes a friend.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Henrietta the Hairy Hippo
Episode.Overview: Molly tells the tale of Henrietta, a hippo who was mocked for being hairy.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Giggles and Tickles
Episode.Overview: Giggles and Tickles play lots of tricks on the other animals.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Zed the Zebra
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Zed the Zebra, who was the fastest in any race.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Adam the Armadillo
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Adam the armadillo, who was too small to play football.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Georgina the Giraffe
Episode.Overview: Georgina the giraffe tells Lucy her life story.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Herbert the Warthog
Episode.Overview: Lucy meets Herbert the Warthog, who tells her about his discovery of music on the savanna.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Pauline the Pelican
Episode.Overview: Pauline can't catch fish so she decides to borrow them from the other animals.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Juicy Fruit Tree
Episode.Overview: A very rare tree from Savannah appears and the animals begin fighting over it.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Elephant Bird
Episode.Overview: Nelson wants to be a bird.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Toby the Tortoise
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Toby the Tortoise, and learns not to be afraid of spiders.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Ronald and the Tic Tic Bird
Episode.Overview: Best friends Ronald and Tic Tic aren't talking to each other.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Audrey's Egg
Episode.Overview: The animals tell the story of Audrey's struggle to keep her egg warm.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Gary the Dromedary
Episode.Overview: Dennis the dromedary tells the story of his curious nephew.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Molly and Nathalie
Episode.Overview: Georgina the giraffe reveals what happened when Nathalie wanted to enter a dancing competition.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Wally the Wombat
Episode.Overview: Boris tells a story set in Australia.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Melanie the Moose
Episode.Overview: Melanie watches some elks frolicking about in a clearing and, marvelling at the finesse and majesty of their movements, decides to try a bit of frolicking herself.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Jungle Clearing
Episode.Overview: The animals tell Lucy about the jungle loggers.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Beverley the Beaver
Episode.Overview: In the story of Beverly the Beaver, Beverly takes all the trees to make a giant log palace.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Doris the Duck
Episode.Overview: Doris the Duck and her friends play a game of 'let's pretend' - but when she decides to be a beautiful princess, she upsets everybody with her constant demands and bossiness.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Esmeralda the Snake
Episode.Overview: Esmeralda the snake invites Herbert the Warthog to live with her when his home is flooded - but soon realises how untidy he is.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Eddie's Big Adventure
Episode.Overview: Molly Hippo's young nephew Eddie's inquisitive nature gets him into all sorts of problems.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Herbert's Birthday Party
Episode.Overview: Herbert decides to change his smelly ways and have a makeover when he hears about a party to which he has not been invited.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Reginald's Big Sleep
Episode.Overview: Poor Reginald can't get any sleep. He draws a big circle around him and tells the other animals not to disturb him - but when he wakes up a long time later, things are very different.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Phoebe the Koala
Episode.Overview: Phoebe is upset because she feels she isn't good at anything. She's always beaten by the other animals and wishes there was just one thing she could be good at. Quite by accident, Phoebe discovers that there is something she's good at.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Hercule Moustache
Episode.Overview: Snowbert recalls the time he and Sidney took a walrus called Hercule Moustache on a trip across the North Pole. But all Hercule did was complain - until he got a very special surprise.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Dawn Chorus
Episode.Overview: Doris the Duck is unhappy with the noise of the dawn chorus. She decides to write a new song, intending to get all the animals to sing the same song.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Petula the Parrot
Episode.Overview: Petula the Parrot is not pleased when she discovers that the greedy Giggles and Tickles have eaten her lovely party food.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Kevin's Magic Trick
Episode.Overview: Kevin pretends he can do magic. Doris is so impressed she makes him put on a magic show at the volcano. A special little cloud comes to Kevin's aid and makes it a wonderful occasion.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Isabel the Flamingo
Episode.Overview: Isabel gives Pauline the Pelican a flamingo makeover, only for her to ruin it by helping her friends out with messy chores. However, when it comes to being centre of attention, Isabel discovers that looks aren't everything.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Watermelon of Doom
Episode.Overview: Herbert's watermelon obsession provides Victor with the perfect tool for revenge on the animals at the waterhole. Herbert realises his mistake, but will it be in time to save the waterhole?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Alan the Aardvark
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Alan the Aardvark, who bores the other animals with his ant obsession.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Important Visitor
Episode.Overview: The animals talk about how rumours once spread across the savannah that an important visitor was on her way.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Puffins of Mossy Bay
Episode.Overview: On kicking their ball into Hercule Moustache's garden, a young puffin football team discovers that to be the best takes teamwork and training. A grumpy walrus coach helps.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Ronald and Rosie
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Ronald the Rhino's many attempts to woo the lovely Rosie.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Nathalie's New Neighbours
Episode.Overview: Nathalie is delighted to see the back of her disgusting neighbour Herbert, but he is replaced by a bunch who are far worse.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Casper the Chameleon
Episode.Overview: Casper the chameleon learns how to change his colour, but despite his grandpa's warning he misuses his special gift.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Seamus the Stork
Episode.Overview: Lucy hears the tale of Seamus, who was the best flyer in Africa until he had an accident.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Gary's Best Friend
Episode.Overview: Gary the dromedary thinks Zed the zebra is brilliant and tries to be just like him. But Zed thinks the camel's attention is ruining his cool.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Georgina's Bumbleberry Soup
Episode.Overview: Georgina takes her bumbleberry soup very seriously, so when the other animals add a little something to the mix, it results in trouble.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Cousin Chuckles
Episode.Overview: When Giggles' and Tickles' cousin Chuckles comes to visit, everyone expects lots of tricks and jokes, but Chuckles is no fun at all.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Joey's Camping Trip
Episode.Overview: Joey the kangaroo has gone camping with his friends but his mum won't leave him alone to enjoy the trip.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Monster in the Forest
Episode.Overview: Jazz the Jaguar and his friends set out to frighten Adam the Armadillo on his walk through the forest. But all their tricks backfire, as Adam does not seem to be afraid of anything.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Boris the Bear
Episode.Overview: Boris the Bear has lost his honeycomb, so his friends help him retrace his steps.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Melanie's Birthday Present
Episode.Overview: Melanie the Moose's friends all give her birthday presents, but they're not the sort of presents she likes.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Victor the Crocodile
Episode.Overview: Victor bans all the other animals from using the water hole as he is annoyed with their noise and splashing. The other animals eventually find a new place to drink and play but will they let Victor join them after the old waterhole dries up?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Hyena's Holiday
Episode.Overview: Harry the hyena's family holiday goes from bad to worse, as each member of the family goes off to do their own thing.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Herbert's Peaceful Day
Episode.Overview: The animals challenge very noisy Herbert the Warthog to stay silent for a whole day.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Annie the Anaconda
Episode.Overview: Adam and Annie find a treasure trail in the jungle, but the other animals race off to find the treasure first.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Nelson's Nephew Nigel
Episode.Overview: Nelson's naughty nephew comes to stay with him and causes chaos wherever he goes. The mischievous little elephant soon learns the importance of the rainy season on the savannah.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Georgina Queen of Fashion
Episode.Overview: Nelson's naughty nephew comes to stay with him and causes chaos wherever he goes. Georgina has become a trendsetter and all the animals compete to match her latest fad. When the animals decide to hold a fashion show, Georgina realises how ridiculous the situation has become.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Lily's Little Brother
Episode.Overview: Lily is very upset by the arrival of a new egg in the nest. She is jealous of the attention her mother and everyone else pays it. Lily tries to teach the egg a lesson but is surprised to discover she does love him after all become.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of The Big Billabong Wave
Episode.Overview: Joey and his friends are eager to learn to surf after Carrie the Cockatoo tells them of her holidays by the beach. The only problem is, there aren't many waves on the billabong. Are any of the young animals patient enough to wait for the legendary billabong wave Wally Two Trees has told them about?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Toby's New House
Episode.Overview: Cartoon series about Lucy, who lives next door to a zoo and every night is told a story by the animals. When the animals on the savannah spring clean and redecorate their homes, Toby the Tortoise gets upset as there isn't much he can do to his shell. He soon realises that perhaps his old shell was perfect after all.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Jamie The Littlest Puffin
Episode.Overview: Jamie is the littlest puffin on Mossy Bay Island who often sucks his feather. The other puffins and Hercule Moustache all try to help him stop the habit.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Ronald's Swimming Lesson
Episode.Overview: The animals are setting off on a picnic, but how are they going to get Ronald across the river? Ronald learns to swim with the help of his friends.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Puffin's Treasure
Episode.Overview: Jamie is the littlest puffin on Mossy Bay Island who often sucks his feather. The other puffins and Hercule Moustache all try to help him stop the habit.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Victor's Bad Teeth Day
Episode.Overview: Victor the crocodile refuses to brush his teeth. Eventually his mouth gets so dirty the other animals have to take action and help him clean them.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Snowbert's New Friend
Episode.Overview: When Snowbert and Sidney have an argument, Snowbert builds a new friend out of ice.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Play and Splash Pool
Episode.Overview: Joey has built himself a play pool, but he is upset when the other animals ruin it. What can they do to make amends to their friend?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Melanie's Little Helpers
Episode.Overview: Melanie is not very good at turning on her snowboard. Luckily, Randolph the racoon has an ingenious plan to help her.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Joey's Sleepover
Episode.Overview: Joey's mum and dad are going out so Joey is going to Phoebe's for a sleepover. He learns how to adapt to other people's routines and way of life.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of The Jungle Pie
Episode.Overview: Kevin is a very fussy eater. Georgina decides to make an amazing Jungle Pie to show Kevin just what he is missing when he refuses to try new foods.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Jazz The Carnival King
Episode.Overview: Jazz is too proud to admit he can't dance, so Adam and the others find a clever way to teach the stubborn jaguar some new moves.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Patsy The Porcupine
Episode.Overview: The savannah animals take Patsy for granted as she always tidies up after them. What happens when she has a fall and hurts herself?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Together Stones
Episode.Overview: Wally Two Trees gives the animals a special stone each to bring them together. Only it doesn't, it just makes them fight. Or does it?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Thelma the Whale
Episode.Overview: Thelma is feeling left out so Jamie the puffin invites her to play in Mossy Bay. The other residents are less pleased about her visit - she is far too big for Mossy Bay! So big in fact she gets stuck! Thelma redeems herself by entertaining everybody while they wait for the tide to come in and free her.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Best Christmas Ever
Episode.Overview: The other animals are upset when Melanie gives their precious Christmas tree away to a family of bisons. They soon realise that Christmas is about sharing, not just having the best tree.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Alan's Catchy Tune
Episode.Overview: Zed and Herbert need a new tune for the concert that evening, and Alan has composed a lovely one, but he is too shy to play it to them.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the Baby Bison
Episode.Overview: Alife and Charlie find a lost baby bison, so they follow the clues to help her get home safely.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Zed The Hero Of Africa
Episode.Overview: The volcano is threatening to erupt but the animals are reluctant to leave their beautiful savannah home. Can anybody come to the rescue?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Herbert's Watermelons
Episode.Overview: Nigel has offered to look after Herbert's precious watermelon crop on ripening day - what could possibly go wrong?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Doris' Precious Things
Episode.Overview: Doris is determined to build the biggest collection of interesting things in Africa, but she upsets the other animals when she takes things that they need.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Leopoldo The Llama
Episode.Overview: Leopoldo is fed up at always having to play everybody else's choice of games. He decides to climb a mountain on his own as nobody else wants to come with him - but they all soon realise that perhaps it is more fun doing things with your friends after all.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Tallulah The Toucan
Episode.Overview: Tallulah refuses to leave her nest without a red flower, as she thinks it's bad luck! Can Adam help her overcome her fears?

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Zed's Really Helpful Mood
The Story of the Flamingo Festival
The Story of the Jimjameree Tree
The Story of Alfie and Charlie's Canoe
The Story of the Whale Trip
The Story of Horace the Hare
The Story of Boomerangball Game
Episode.Overview: Joey the kangaroo and his friend love playing boomerang ball together. However when their mums fall out they are no longer allowed to play with each other. The friends work together to try to reconcile their mums so that they can play again.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the End of the Rainy Season
The Story of a Long Night in the Jungle
The Story of a the Record-Breaking Puffins
The Story Of The Merry Jinglewhizz
The Story of the Cooking Contest
Episode.Overview: Horace the hare and Bao Bao the panda can't agree who is the better chef.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of the House of Leaves
Episode.Overview: Nelson the elephant liked making things. One day he decided to build the biggest and best house of leaves there had ever been.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story Of Roland And His Boulders
The Story of the Savannah Craze
The Story of the Great Rains
The Story of the Jungle Ball
The Story of Alans Scooter
The Story of Bao Baos Long Goodbye
The story of Reginald's New Look
The Story of Confusus the Carp
The Story of the Last Buluru Berry
The Story of Washi-Washi Day
The Story of Doris' Flower
Episode.Overview: Doris the duck finds a plant promising beautiful flowers. She enlists Toby and Kevin's help to protect it at all costs. Eventually Doris learns that flowers should be left for everybody to enjoy.

Episode.EpisodeName: The Story of Gertie the Goat
The Story of Tallulahs Surprise Present
